trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.

You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.

-or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance was retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Object> to be compared.
if other is a and the values for the , , , and properties are equal to their counterpart in the current ; otherwise, .
Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
Gets the style for the left border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.

-or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance has an associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the style for the right border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.

-or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance has an associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
A copy of the current instance.
Gets the style for the top border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.

The ToString method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
A string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
